sentences.sContent: She was fitted with a pacemaker after suffering serious heart trouble.
sentences.sCn: 她在心脏出了严重问题后装上了心脏起搏器。

synos.tran: [基医][解剖]起搏器；领跑者；标兵

remMethod.val: pace(速度) + maker(制造者) → 领跑者

words.tran: 标兵；先导者，步调调整者

trans.tranCn: [基医] 起搏器；领跑者；标兵
trans.tranOther: a small machine that is placed inside someone’s chest in order to help their heart beat regularly
